thread.title: UNC Charlotte Revamps Wireless Network to Support Mobile Devices, Ed Tech and More
thread.title_full: UNC Charlotte Revamps Wireless Network to Support Mobile Devices, Ed Tech and More

title: UNC Charlotte Revamps Wireless Network to Support Mobile Devices, Ed Tech and More
text:
22 UNC Charlotte Revamps Wireless Network to Support Mobile Devices, Ed Tech and More 
Campus Technology: A dramatic increase in the number of wireless devices on campus, coupled with heightened demand for new technologies in the classroom, led the University of North Carolina at Charlotte to upgrade its wireless infrastructure. The institution is deploying an Aruba Networks 802.11ac Wave 1 and Wave 2 wireless LAN to meet the connectivity needs of its 31,000 students and staff.
